title: New: i am runnings in circles – full moon (Demo)
body:
Sadness is the key to all great music, right? With **i am running in circles’** biography stating ‘I got sad and made music’, it’s clear that he agrees with this notion.

For a track recorded on a tape recorder and then pieced together in Garage Band, _full moon_ is a devilishly ambitious composition. So it owes much to **The Microphones** in its opening exchanges, before blossoming into a gorgeous, **Sigur Ros**\-esque number, yet **Eli Smith** (aka i am running in circles) injects his own, heavy hearted sense of honesty and frailty.

_‘now i’m sprawled across my bedroom floor / while the sound of the wind in the trees reverberates / haunting me’_
